text:
Raskolnikov's Revelation

Tension fills the room, eyes wide.  
Raskolnikov: “He came in while I slept.”  
Pulcheria: “Thank God! What more?”  
Dounia: “What does he want?”  

---

Raskolnikov sips tea, deep in thought.  
Raskolnikov: “He wants to propose to you.”  
Pulcheria: “What was it?”  
Raskolnikov: “I’ll tell you later.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov reveals to Dounia and their mother that Mr. Svidrigaïlov wishes to propose something to her and mentions an inheritance left to Dounia.
